mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Day 1 - March 26, 2022

- Depart from Charlotte to Hilton Head by Flight F4055090 at 6:07 PM. Estimated travel time is 1 hour 20 minutes. (Cost: $92)
- Upon arrival in Hilton Head, check into Williamsburg Home Away From Home! for overnight stay. (Cost: $164)
- Dinner at Mr. Brown, an Italian restaurant, from 8:00 PM to 9:30 PM. (Cost: $72 for 5 people)

Day 2 - March 27, 2022

- Breakfast at Moni Bakers, a Mediterranean bakery, from 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM. (Cost: $30 for 5 people)
- Rent a car in Hilton Head and drive to nearby Italian or French restaurants for lunch and dinner. Suggested options include:
	+ L'Olivo Ristorante Italiano, an Italian restaurant, from 12:00 PM to 1:30 PM. (Cost: $150 for 5 people)
	+ La Fontanella, an Italian restaurant, from 6:30 PM to 8:00 PM. (Cost: $200 for 5 people)
- Overnight stay at Williamsburg Home Away From Home! (Cost: $164)

Day 3 - March 28, 2022

- Breakfast at Modern Luxury Apartment 15 Mins To Central Park, a French bakery, from 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM. (Cost: $40 for 5 people)
- Return the rental car in Hilton Head and check out of Williamsburg Home Away From Home!
- Depart from Hilton Head to Charlotte by Flight F4056985 at 8:07 PM. Estimated travel time is 1 hour 24 minutes. (Cost: $46)

Total Cost:

* Accommodation: $328 for 2 nights
* Transportation: $300 for flights and car rental
* Food and drinks: $572 for meals and snacks

Total Cost = $1,200
This plan falls well within the budget of $7,000.
